content.question: The acceleration, in meters per second per second, of a race car is modeled by <math alttext="A, of t, equals, t cubed, minus the fraction 15 over 2, end fraction, times t squared, plus 12 t, plus 10" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>A</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>t</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>15</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac><msup><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>12</mn><mi>t</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>10</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>, where <math alttext="t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is measured in seconds. What is the car’s maximum acceleration on the time interval <math alttext="0 is less than or equal to t, which is less than or equal to 6 " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>0</mn><mo>≤</mo><mi>t</mi><mo>≤</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: The maximum acceleration of the race car is 2 meters per second per second and occurs at <math alttext="t equals 4" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> seconds.

The maximum acceleration of the race car is 6 meters per second per second and occurs at <math alttext="t equals 28" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>28</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> seconds.

The maximum acceleration of the race car is 15.5 meters per second per second and occurs at <math alttext="t equals 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> second.

The maximum acceleration of the race car is 28 meters per second per second and occurs at <math alttext="t equals 6" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> seconds.

content.answer: The maximum acceleration of the race car is 28 meters per second per second and occurs at <math alttext="t equals 6" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> seconds.

skill.text: Skill 3.F: Explain the meaning of mathematical solutions in context.
